dynamic_position_sizing._risk_comment: Reduced from 1.0% to 0.5% for more conservative trading
dynamic_position_sizing._lot_limits_comment: LIVE: Fixed at 0.01 lot for $200 account safety

_sltp_comment: Wider stops ($200 SL, $300 TP) for volatile BTC market. Overridden by dynamic_sltp when enabled.
_min_atr_comment: Minimum ATR(14) on M5 to allow trading. Filters out low-volatility chop zones.
_min_atr_explanation: BTCUSD M5 ATR typically 80-200 during active sessions, 30-60 during chop. 50 filters dead zones while keeping most real moves.
_trade_cooldown_comment: LIVE: Minimum 3 minutes between ANY trades (win or loss). Prevents overtrading. Was 0 (disabled).
_news_block_comment: DISABLED Feb 20 - news filter bug (abs() treated past events as upcoming, API returns stale data). Set to 0 to disable.
_defensive_trading_comment: Defensive trading settings to protect against consecutive losses and bad market conditions
_ema_trend_filter_comment: EMA Trend Filter ENABLED - BUY only in uptrend (EMA50>EMA200), SELL only in downtrend
_ema_explanation: UPTREND = EMA50 > EMA200 (allow BUY). DOWNTREND = EMA50 < EMA200 (block BUY).
_max_spread_comment: Maximum spread as % of price. For BTCUSD at $100k, 0.05% = $50 max spread. Set to 0 to disable.
_loss_cooldown_comment: LIVE: 15min cooldown after individual losses. Circuit breaker (3 consecutive) stops trading for rest of MYT day.
_max_consecutive_comment: LIVE: 3 consecutive losses = DAILY SHUTDOWN (no more trades until next MYT calendar day). Changed Feb 20 from 1hr cooldown.
_session_trading_comment: Session-aware trading: Trade only during optimal market hours

asian._comment: Tokyo session - lower volume, add 5% to confidence threshold

european._comment: London session - high volume, normal trading

american._comment: New York session - high volatility, good for breakouts

off_hours._comment: Off-hours: +10% threshold = effective 65% confidence needed. Was 20% which blocked nearly all off-hours trades.

_partial_profit_comment: Partial Profit Taking: Close portion of position at 1R, move SL to breakeven

partial_profit_taking._explanation: When price moves 1x your risk (SL distance), close 50% and move SL to entry.

_smart_exit_comment: Smart Exit Logic: Time-based exit and stagnation detection

smart_exit._explanation: Max hold 2hr still active. Min hold 15min: trailing stop and stagnant exit cannot trigger before 15min. Stagnant exit DISABLED (Feb 20).

momentum_filter._explanation: Check last 3 M5 candles momentum. BUY blocked if price falling >0.1%, SELL blocked if price rising >0.1%. Signal must align with recent price direction.

dynamic_sltp._explanation: Path B: SL = 1.5x ATR(14), TP = 2.0x ATR(14). R:R = 1.33:1. Matches backtest config.

_max_weekly_trades_comment: Maximum 15 trades per MYT calendar week (Mon-Sun). Counter persisted via trade_log.csv, survives restarts.
